songs.title: UFC
songs.lyrics:
[Voice call]
Hey Rob, I'm staying awake for UFC
I just called to let you know that, uh
On Monday night on Spike TV at 11 'o clock
Our new TV show hits, The Ultimate Fighter
I want you to check it out, and uh
Give me a call, tell me what you think about it
7:02, hope all's well with you, buddy. Call me
